content: School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science - University of Queensland Skip to menu Skip to content Skip to footer School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science Menu Explore the UQ difference Create Change Join us to build a society that is more connected, healthy and secure.With a focus on people, data and code, UQ's School of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science is at the leading-edge of computer science, IT and electrical engineering.We take pride in our reputation for teaching excellence and expert research. Our students, graduates, teachers and researchers are revolutionising technology to solve the world's greatest challenges. Study with us Our research Partner with us Our disciplines Cyber Security and Software Engineering Data Science Human-Centred Computing Imaging, Sensing and Biomedical Engineering Power, Energy and Control Engineering Interdisciplinary research initiatives led by EECS Artificial Intelligence Our Research Centres Cyber Security 1st in Queensland for computer science and information systems(QS World University Rankings 2025) Latest news Scanning the tongue to detect and track Motor Neurone Disease 23 October 2025 AUPEC 2025 Wrap-Up: Powering Innovation, Partnerships, and People for a Net-Zero Future 9 October 2025 UQ and Powerlink strengthen partnership to drive Queensland’s energy future 2 October 2025 Read more news Student enquiries Current domestic and international studentsEmail: studentenquiries@eecs.uq.edu.auFuture student enquiriesEnquire onlinePhone: +617 3067 8608Higher Degree by Research student enquiriesEmail: hdr.eecs@enquire.uq.edu.au General enquiries Email: enquiries@eecs.uq.edu.auPhone: +61 7 3365 2097 Student resources Academic adviceFaculty of Engineering, Architecture and Information TechnologyApply to study at UQKeep in touchLike us on FacebookFollow us on XJoin us on LinkedIn Staff resources Staff intranetDigital Content Request School academic office Level 4General Purpose South (78)The University of QueenslandQueensland 4072 Australia(Map)8.30am–4.30pm, Mon–Fri
